node.excerpt: Convincing yourself that some things wouldn't work out is hard. I wrote this one in an attempt to believe it, hiding the predictable title choice behind an acronym. YDWML!  Feeling too much and too fast  It’s not healthy for me  Not healthy for you…

frontmatter.title: YDWML!
frontmatter.description: Not healthy for me, not healthy for you if you knew.

node.excerpt: I've tried many approaches when it comes to writing, but one method that I love is coming up with a title first. And titles come out of nowhere. For instance, I held onto the idea of a two-part song with similar messages, but different approaches…

frontmatter.title: In Case You Ever Listen
frontmatter.description: My mind goes as far as that and it doesn't get back as soon as you do.

node.excerpt: Today is Children's Day in Brazil and once again I'm not home for the occasion. I think it means a lot transition-wise for me, considering the whole symbolism of living alone and away from my family. Anyway, today is not supposed to be a sad moment…

frontmatter.title: Home, Home
frontmatter.description: I'm already where I wanted to be from the start.

node.excerpt: Do you know the feeling of when you learn a new word and suddenly everybody starts using it? I've wondered in the past about how these things also happen with relationships, like when I didn't know a person before but they appear once and won't stop…

frontmatter.title: Faith-Seeker
frontmatter.description: Believe me if you can, I know I'm biased.

node.excerpt:
After a long process of overthinking, worrying and postponing, I finally decided to begin this blog.
With an ever-growing interest in music and all processes around it, I was tempted to try my hand at songwriting over two years ago. My previous…

frontmatter.title: Self-Titled
frontmatter.description: After a long process of overthinking, worrying and postponing, I finally decided to begin this blog.
